description.en:
### Girlfriend Face

1. Girlfriend Face / Kanojo Face (彼女フェイス); Comic Anthurium 2020-03
• Konishi-kun is going out with his senpai from the drama club, Nakagawa-san. However, she is strict and serious and hasn't treated him like a lover. In order to advance their relationship, he invites her to come to his house to help him study. How many steps will they be able to move forward this time? ♥
2. Girlfriend Face Encore / Kanojo Face Encore (彼女フェイス encore); Comic Anthurium 2020-12
3. Better than fiction ; Comic Anthurium 2023-11
4. Together with Onei-chan / Onei-chan to Issho (おねいちゃんといっしょ); Comic Anthurium 2023-05
5. I Really Love You / Yappari Kimi ga Suki (やっぱり君が好き); Comic Anthurium 2018-12
• Minato returns home early, drunk, and behaving suspiciously. Her boyfriend Yuuya suspects it’s related to the recent fight they had.
6. [I Want to Support You!](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/i-want-to-support-you-english) / Support shite Hoshii no (サポしてほしいのっ); Comic Bavel 2020-01
7. Afterschool Improv / Houkago Étude (放課後エチュード); Comic Anthurium 2018-07
8. Rain of March / Sangatsu no Ame (三月の雨); Comic Anthurium 2019-07
